sqlMap.statement:
SELECT TM.RECVTRANNAME AS TRANCODE, TM.EAISVCNAME AS EAISVCCODE, HE.EAISVCDESC AS EAISVCDESC FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$ TM, $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 HE WHERE TM.EAISVCNAME = HE.EAISVCNAME
TM.RECVTRANNAME LIKE '%'||#tranCode#||'%'
TM.EAISVCNAME LIKE '%'||#eaiSvcCode#||'%'
HE.EAISVCDESC LIKE '%'||#eaiSvcDesc#||'%'
